name: object.assign
description: ES6 spec-compliant Object.assign shim. From https://github.com/es-shims/es6-shim

scripts.test: npm run lint && es-shim-api && npm run tests-only && npm run security
scripts.tests-only: npm run test:implementation && npm run test:shim && npm run test:shams
scripts.test:shams: npm run test:shams:getownpropertysymbols && npm run test:shams:corejs
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
